DataElement.preferredName: Report Document Version Revision Reason ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A document characterized by information or other content which is tailored to the context of a given situation and audience. EXAMPLE(S): Safety Report, Study Report. The reason why the document is revised.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A short textual account; having provided a short account.:An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of work.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications._An act of alteration involving reconsideration and modification.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: A short textual account; having provided a short account.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.
A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.

An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
